results.idea: Short-term momentum: 21-day returns cross-sectional rank

results.description: SUGGESTION1: compare ts_scale(ts_returns, short) vs ts_scale(long) and take difference. SUGGESTION3: backfill if needed. SUGGESTION4: price used. KEEP_IN_MIND: under operator limit. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by declining share count (buybacks): ts_delta(ShareCount) negative preferred
results.description: SUGGESTION1: favor momentum where sharecount declines using ts_delta. SUGGESTION3: backfill SC if sparse. SUGGESTION4: sharecount often available. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum of institutional flows: combine fund flow proxy with stock returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use flows F and returns. SUGGESTION3: F may be sparse -> ts_backfill(F,90). SUGGESTION4: use high-quality fund flow dataset. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with group_neutralize and winsorize to limit group outliers
results.description: SUGGESTION1: group_neutralize(winsorize(returns)) applied. SUGGESTION3: winsorize helps NaNs. SUGGESTION4: price used. KEEP_IN_MIND: group used as parameter and operators under limit. Confidence 0.65.
